channel.title: Couple of announcements
channel.description:
first off:
https://open.spotify.com/track/1KaHD8tqbZewpk1sIT71uk
secondly: album/EP out this summer.
have a nice day :)

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Oh lord. Who made this mess?

  • If announcing a new album, post it in the WIP category.

  • If posting about a new finished track, post it in the FINISHED TRACKS category.

  • If the track already has a topic under FINISHED TRACKS and is now released on Spotify too, then post that update under the original topic.

  • Definitely don’t post in in multiple categories or under Branding & Distribution.

“Branding & Distribution: All about building your artist brand and distributing your tracks. Post tracks in the respective categories though, not here!”

Yep. All of those things.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
akabillposters:

But good to know it’s ok to post multiple times about the same release in multiple categories.

He hasn’t posted anything about this track before on the forums. So this is the first time he’s posting about anything in regards to this. I think if there was multiple threads, that may be an issue, but there aren’t. No use getting into a tizzy.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
I have the capacity to have opinions about both.

But good to know it’s ok to post multiple times about the same release in multiple categories.

Game on!

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
Fwiw, I think that posts regarding one of the biggest distribution platforms in the world (Spotify) would do fine in the category he selected. Regardless, I don’t think that anybody is confused because he posted here instead of in finished tracks. Therefore, how about focus on his awesome upcoming EP instead of which category would perfectly suit his announcement

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Then, imo, the right way to post about it would be to announce the new/coming soon release in Finished Tracks and add the addendum there and also update the original thread.

Just seems cleaner and more appropriate.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
That’s an option. But I think this is more of an announcement to this being a new album/EP project that will be releasing soon. The addendum is the track, which appears to be part of it, being out on sporty spotify as a single.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
So, perhaps update the original Finished Track thread?

If people start routinely starting new threads for every each platform, it’s gonna get messy really quickly.

There’s plenty of posts on there for each track successfully moved onto Spotify in that thread.

Then maybe post about the track now being on Spotify in that thread?

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
akabillposters:

If it’s announcing a finished track, then why isn’t the Finished Tracks category more appropriate?

It’s not about the track being finished, the track has been finished for quite a while, a month at least I think. Its about it being up on spotify now.

akabillposters:

I think that one’s really aimed at those celebrating their first jump on to Spotify.

There’s plenty of posts on there for each track successfully moved onto Spotify in that thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple of announcements
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
If it’s announcing a finished track, then why isn’t the Finished Tracks category more appropriate?

(The Finished Tracks cat isn’t specific to any particular platform.)

if this thread is anything to go by

I think that one’s really aimed at those celebrating their first jump on to Spotify.

Read full topic
